abilities.name: Blood Pool
abilities.details:
When Nocturne kills an enemy with any of his abilities, he increases his maximum health by a small amount permanently. Large minions, monsters and heroes' kills grant larger increase.

Nocturne uses his health to cast abilities instead of mana.

abilities.name: Vampiric Drain
abilities.details:
On Sword mode, Nocturne stabs in a target direction, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power and maximum health) to all enemies hit and healing himself (scaling with magical power plus a percentage of his missing health).

On Staff mode, Nocturne drains the blood from a target enemy for the next few seconds, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power and maximum health) and heals himself (scaling with magical power). In addition, he also gains increased movement speed during the cast.

abilities.name: Sanguine Sword / Sanguine Staff
abilities.details:
Nocturne shapeshifts his weapon into either a sword or a staff, gaining different abilities.

When switching to Sword mode, his basic attack becomes shorter range but deals additional magical damage (scaling with magical power and maximum health). In addition, his first basic attack within the first few seconds after shapeshifting will briefly slow the target.

When switching to Staff mode, his basic attack gains additional range. In addition, his first basic attack within the first few seconds after shapeshifting deals additional magical damage (scaling with magical power) and reduces the targetâ€™s magic resistance.

abilities.name: Death Grasp
abilities.details:
On Sword mode, Nocturne dashes in a target direction and sends out a claw, pulling the first enemy hit to him and dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power and maximum health).

On Staff mode, Nocturne summons a claw in a target direction, pulling all enemies within the path towards him and dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power and maximum health). Death Grasp also drains the pulled back enemies, healing Nocturne for a small amount per enemy.

abilities.name: Night Feast
abilities.details:
Nocturne channels for a second then sends out a number of Blood Bat each second for the next few seconds. Each Blood Bat will attack a nearby enemy, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power and maximum health).

On Sword mode, each Blood Bat will return after each attack to heal (scaling with maximum health) him.

On Staff mode, each Blood Bat will explode upon contact, briefly fearing the target. Each target can only be feared once during the Night Feast.

Blood Bat will prioritise enemy heroes first, then closer enemies.
